question: Shahjahan-Nama by Inayat Khan covers up to which year of Shah Jahan's reign?
explanation: Inayat Khan alias Muhammad Tahir Ashna was a high official of Shah Jahan, who compiled a biography of the emperor up to the thirteenth year of his reign. Inayat Khan was a close friend of Shah Jahan. After retirement he settled in Kashmir, where he died in 1666.
